setup_commands: apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential cmake
cat README.md || cat INSTALL.md || find . -name "*.md" | xargs grep -i "install\|depend"

apt-get install -y libavcodec-dev libavformat-dev libswscale-dev libx264-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev libmbedtls-dev libgl1-mesa-dev libjansson-dev libluajit-5.1-dev python3-dev libx11-dev libxcb-randr0-dev libxcb-shm0-dev libxcb-xinerama0-dev libxcb-composite0-dev libxcb-xfixes0-dev libxcb1-dev libx11-xcb-dev libxcb-keysyms1-dev libxcb-image0-dev libxcb-shape0-dev libxcb-render-util0-dev libpulse-dev libv4l-dev
apt-get install -y software-properties-common && add-apt-repository -y ppa:kitware/kitware-archive && apt-get update && apt-get install -y cmake

apt-get install -y wget && wget https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/releases/download/v3.28.3/cmake-3.28.3-linux-x86_64.sh && chmod +x cmake-3.28.3-linux-x86_64.sh && ./cmake-3.28.3-linux-x86_64.sh --skip-license --prefix=/usr/local
cmake --version && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake ..
cmake --version && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake ..
cd /testbed && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake ..
cd /testbed && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake ..
add-apt-repository -y ppa:jonathonf/ffmpeg-6 && apt-get update && apt-get install -y ffmpeg libavcodec-dev libavformat-dev libswscale-dev libavutil-dev
add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntuhandbook1/ffmpeg6 && apt-get update && apt-get install -y ffmpeg libavcodec-dev libavformat-dev libswscale-dev libavutil-dev
cd /testbed && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake ..
apt-get update && apt-get install -y qt6-base-dev qt6-base-private-dev qt6-tools-dev-tools
apt-get install -y libwayland-client++0 libwayland-client-dev libwayland-cursor-dev libwayland-egl-backend-dev
cd /testbed && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DBUILD_FRONTEND=OFF -DENABLE_UI=OFF -DENABLE_PLUGINS=OFF ..
cd /testbed && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DBUILD_FRONTEND=OFF -DENABLE_UI=OFF -DENABLE_PLUGINS=OFF -DSKIP_FRONTEND=ON ..
cd /testbed && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DEXCLUDE_FRONTEND=ON -DENABLE_UI=OFF -DENABLE_PLUGINS=OFF ..
cd /testbed && sed -i '/add_subdirectory(frontend)/d' CMakeLists.txt && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake ..
cd /testbed && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DDISABLE_AJA=ON ..
cd /testbed && sed -i '/add_subdirectory(aja)/d' plugins/CMakeLists.txt && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake ..
cd /testbed && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DENABLE_PLUGINS=OFF ..
